comments:
The AspectJ editor does not show up in the m9 build of Eclipse 3.0. I know that
1.1.9 of AJDT is just a convenience build for those who are using the post-m4
builds of 3.0, but it would be great to have an AJDT version working completely
with m9.

(compilation seems to work fine :-)

Forgot the stack trace...

Fixed in cvs, will be in 1.1.10
